title: Great Zimbabwe
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 485 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 620L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z1
description: The ruins of Great Zimbabwe include tall stone walls and towers, as well as buildings made from a mixture of stone and mud. This book introduces readers to the many questions surrounding the city. Who built it? Who lived there? What was the purpose of its buildings and walls?
